name: Stiggs
descriptions: Stiggs is a repairman specializing in robotics, located at Adams Air Force Base in the year 2277.

A wastelander by birth, the Enclave found Stiggs in malnourished condition and brought him back to health from a severe bout of radiation poisoning. He was then put to work maintaining and creating the latest in flamethrower technologies for the Enclave, but he is troubled by these accomplishments.
Stiggs appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.

topics.topic_text: What type of defenses are upstairs?
topics.response_text: Well, just above us is a deathclaw research facility. Most of the deathclaws are out fighting, but there might be one or two left.

topics.topic_text: How do I get to the Satellite Tower?
topics.response_text: Well, the Satellite Tower is right on top of the base. I'm sure you saw it before you came in.
Oh, thank goodness! I'm Stiggs. Nice to meet you.

topics.topic_text: Likewise. I was wondering if you could answer a few questions.
topics.response_text: Man, am I glad you realize I'm not one of the bad guys. I'll be happy to answer any questions you have.

topics.topic_text: The only reason you're still alive is because I want information.
topics.response_text: Right. Well let's get down to it, then. Ask me anything you want.

topics.topic_text: All of the robots are run off of a V-31 Mainframe?
topics.response_text: Huh. It's nice to finally meet someone who knows what the heck I'm talking about.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing down here?
topics.response_text: I uh... work on the robots. I fix 'em up.

topics.topic_text: So where exactly is the mainframe?
topics.response_text: Well, you'll want to get to the floor above, and then make your way to the middle. That's where the mainframe is.

topics.topic_text: You're really helpful. Why should I trust you?
topics.response_text: I've been trying to get outa here for awhile. See, I've done things for the Enclave.... Things I can't say I'm proud of, but a man's gotta eat.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I'm going to hurt you.
topics.response_text: Please! I never did anything to you!
If it's not one thing, it's another. Well, got to run.{mildly sarcastic}

conversation.response_text: Come on Sparky, Hoover. Let's go.
It was nice meeting you, but I have to get while the getting's good. Maybe I'll see you around.
